title: "New machine learning models can predict adverse outcomes after abdominal hernia surgery with high accuracy"
excerpt: "New machine learning models can predict the risk of hernia recurrence and other complications after abdominal hernia repair with an accuracy of up to 85%, and also identify factors associated with poor outcomes."
